name: ARHitTestResult
desc: Information about a real-world surface found by examining a point on the screen.

items.name: var type: ARHitTestResult.ResultType
items.desc: The kind of detected feature the search result represents.

items.name: struct ARHitTestResult.ResultType
items.desc: Possible types for specifying a hit-test search, or for the result of a hit-test search.

items.name: var anchor: ARAnchor?
items.desc: The anchor representing the detected surface, if any.

items.name: var distance: CGFloat
items.desc: The distance, in meters, from the camera to the detected surface.

items.name: var worldTransform: simd_float4x4
items.desc: The position and orientation of the result relative to the world coordinate system.

items.name: var localTransform: simd_float4x4
items.desc: The position and orientation of the result relative to the nearest anchor or feature point.
